Package com.mhealthatlas.keycloak

Class MHealthAtlasEventListenerProvider

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.keycloak.MHealthAtlasEventListenerProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.keycloak.events.EventListenerProvider, org.keycloak.provider.Provider
public class MHealthAtlasEventListenerProvider
extends Object
implements org.keycloak.events.EventListenerProvider
Contains methods to process keycloak events.

    • onEvent

      public void onEvent​(org.keycloak.events.Event event)
      Listens to user registered events and publishes the corresponding "user_created" kafka event on the "user-management" topic.
      Specified by:
      onEvent in interface org.keycloak.events.EventListenerProvider
      Parameters:
      event - the keycloak event data

    • onEvent

      public void onEvent​(org.keycloak.events.admin.AdminEvent event, boolean includeRepresentation)
      Listens to keycloak admin events and publishes them on kafka.

      Processed Events (keycloak event resource type, operation -> topic: event type):

      • USER, CREATE -> user-management: user_created
      • USER, UPDATE -> user-management: user_updated
      • USER, DELETE -> user-management: user_deleted
      • REALM_ROLE_MAPPING, CREATE -> user-management: user_role_mapping_created
      • REALM_ROLE_MAPPING, DELETE -> user-management: user_role_mapping_deleted
      • GROUP_MEMBERSHIP, CREATE -> user-management: user_group_mapping_created, enterprise-management: user_group_mapping_created
      • GROUP_MEMBERSHIP, DELETE -> user-management: user_group_mapping_deleted, enterprise-management: user_group_mapping_deleted
      • GROUP, CREATE -> enterprise-management: group_created
      • GROUP, UPDATE -> enterprise-management: group_updated
      • GROUP, DELETE -> enterprise-management: group_deleted
      Specified by:
      onEvent in interface org.keycloak.events.EventListenerProvider
      Parameters:
      event - the keycloak admin event data
      includeRepresentation - the flag indicating if an event contains a detailed resource representation

    • validateEventDetails

      private boolean validateEventDetails​(Map<String,​String> details, String... keyNames)
      Validates that the event detail contains all necessary data.
      Parameters:
      details - the event details
      keyNames - the necessary data keys
      Returns:
      True, if the event details contains all necessary data;
      False otherwise;

    • validateEventRepresentation

      private boolean validateEventRepresentation​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode representation, String... keyNames)
      Validates the the event representation contains all necessary data.
      Parameters:
      representation - the event representation
      keyNames - the necessary data keys
      Returns:
      True, if the event representation contains all necessary data;
      False otherwise;
